Class DBConnector

java.lang.Object
persistence.DBConnector
public class DBConnector extends Object
Adapter implementation as connector to database

    • checkPlayer

      public boolean checkPlayer​(String name)
      Function to check if a player exists
      Parameters:
      name - name of the player
      Returns:
      boolean true if player exists / false if not

    • createPlayer

      public boolean createPlayer​(String name, String password)
      Function to create a player
      Parameters:
      name - name of the player
      password - password used by the player
      Returns:
      boolean true if player was created / false if not

    • playerLogin

      public boolean playerLogin​(String name, String password)
      Function to "login" a player
      Parameters:
      name - name of the player
      password - used by the player
      Returns:
      true if combination of player and password was found / false if not

    • createHistory

      public boolean createHistory​(PlayerHistory history)
      Function to store the game history of a player !Currently only stores enemys information if enemy has profile in DB!
      Parameters:
      history - history object storing the important game information

    • getPlayerHistory

      public PlayerHistory[] getPlayerHistory​(String name)
      Gets all histories of the player
      Parameters:
      name - name of the player
      Returns:
      null if player is not found, no history is found or an error occurred. Returns PlayerHistory object if all information was found (enemies might be null)

    • createSpeicher

      public boolean createSpeicher​(Storage storage)
      Function to create a 'Speicherstand'

    • getSpeicher

      public Storage getSpeicher​(int speicher_id)
      Function to load a speicher object from Storage
      Parameters:
      speicher_id - the id of the speicher object
      Returns:
      a fully constructed speicher object

    • getSpeicherList

      public Integer[] getSpeicherList()
      Function that returns a list of all available speicher-objects
      Returns:
      array of ids, null if something failed/nothing was found
